meanings.definition: Make (something) soluble, especially by the action of a solvent.
meanings.sent1: I am solubilising the sugar in water to make a sweet solution.
meanings.sent2: The chemist is solubilising the powder in the liquid to create a clear solution.
meanings.sent3: The magician claimed he could solubilise a coin in thin air!
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a way of solubilising the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sun's warmth seemed to solubilise the frost on the window pane.

meanings.sent1: The sugar cube is solubilising in the hot tea.
meanings.sent2: The salt crystals are solubilising quickly in the water.
meanings.sent3: The mystery of the disappearing ink was solved when they realized it was solubilising!
meanings.sent4: His resolve was as solubilising as a sugar cube in water.
meanings.sent5: The bond between them was fragile, easily solubilising under pressure.
